name: Ponko
description:
Use your W A S D Keys to move

Press 1 to turn into a ball, you can only move while you're a ball

Press 2 to turn into a cube, you won't be moved by the wind when you're a cube

Press 3 to flatten, you can slide through small openings while you're flattened

Press E to become spiky! You can cling to walls while you have your spikes out.

Game made by Hernán Castillo and Daniel Paz

Special thanks to Juan Camilo Rodriguez
